# BLES01623.savepatch

### 1.  Currently BSD is not compatible with this title. This title has 2nd layer encryption.
### 2. Unlock Everything

Target File: `BLES01623SYSTEM_SAVE\SAVE_SYS.DAT`

```
4000030C 00000001
442D0001 00000000
```

### 3. Story Time Chart Unlock

Target File: `BLES01623SYSTEM_SAVE\SAVE_SYS.DAT`

```
40000753 00000002
40470001 00000000
```

### 4. All Character/All Costume/Title 300

Target File: `BLES01623SYSTEM_SAVE\SAVE_SYS.DAT`

```
4000030C 00000001
44310001 00000000
```

### 5. Title 99

Target File: `BLES01623SYSTEM_SAVE\SAVE_SYS.DAT`

```
400004FB 00000001
408A0001 00000000
40000585 00000000
41B80001 00000000
000004FB 00000000
```


### 7. Title 300

Target File: `BLES01623SYSTEM_SAVE\SAVE_SYS.DAT`

```

42420001 00000000
```
